name: Project Zodiac (Demo)
description:
So this is the actual, official demo for the game my friends and I are making. I wanted to leave the other demo up...but kinda just decided against it.

This isn't a very long demo by any means, but I hope it does give a good impression, at least.

Please report any glitches or errors or anything!

There's also no way to get a game over in this one. I wanted to add a way in, but there is just no real opportunity for it, or not one that would make sense at least.
